resources.string: Learn rules of\nDivisibility Test\nWith a few touch
A number is divisible by 2 if its unit digit is any of 0, 2, 4, 6, 8.
A number is divisible by 3 only when the sum of its digits is divisible by 3.
A number is divisible by 8 if the number formed by hundred\'s, ten\'s and unit\'s digit of the given number id divisible by 8.
A number is divisible by 9 only, when the sum of its digits is divisible by 9.
A number is divisible by 10 only when its unit digit is 0
A number is divisible by 11, if the difference between te sum of its digits at odd places and the sum of its digits at even places is either 0 or a number divisible by 11.
